title: LSRL Form
question_text: Least squares regression lines have the form of

choices.text:
$y = ax^2+bx+c$
Define $x$ and $y$ as variables.
Define $a$, $b$, and $c$ as constants.

$y = a+bx$
Define $x$ and $y$ as variables.
Define $a$ and $b$ as constants.

$y = ab^x$
Define $x$ and $y$ as variables.
Define a and b as constants.
